speaker: Presented by Francis M. Gibbons
title: Statistical Report 1974
description: The First Presidency issued the following statistical report concerning the membership of the Church at the end of the year 1974:
body: Prepared by the Office of the Presiding Bishopric
For the information of the members of the Church:
